name: stylefruits
tag_list: ecommerce, fashion, social-commerce, outfits, styling, community
overview:
stylefruits is a social commerce platform for fashion, which provides its users with inspiration, recommendations and entertainment when shopping for fashion online. By linking conventional online shopping to social features, stylefruits fills a strategic gap in the process of shopping for apparel, shoes and accessories on the Internet.

On stylefruits, users can choose clothing and accessories from a variety of online shops and arrange them in customized outfits. As an inspiration, users can browse through recommendations of others, discuss styling questions and let other users evaluate their own outfits.

All products used in the outfits on stylefruits can be ordered directly from stylefruits shop partners. Thus, stylefruits offers benefits for both online shop operators and customers. Customers benefit from the wide choice resulting from the bundling of shops. For shop operators, the integration on stylefruits represents an attractive distribution channel.

stylefruits was founded in 2008 and is based in Munich, Germany. In 2010, stylefruits has been awarded the fastest growing publisher by German affiliate network Zanox.
